entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then clearing. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
